name: npc_dota_hero_sand_king
bio_loc: The sands of the Scintillant Waste are alive and sentient--the whole vast desert speaks to itself, thinking thoughts only such a vastness can conceive. But when it needs must find a form to communicate with those of more limited scope, it frees a fragment of itself, and fills a carapace of magic armor formed by the cunning Djinn of Qaldin. This essential identity calls itself Crixalis, meaning 'Soul of the Sand,' but others know it as Sand King.  Sand King takes the form of a huge arachnid, inspired by the Scintillant Waste's small but ubiquitous denizens; and this is a true outward expression of his ferocious nature. Guardian, warrior, ambassador--Sand King is all of these things, inseparable from the endless desert that gave him life.
hype_loc: Not many can survive an ambush from Sand King. Demolishing everything around him with waves of deadly vibration from his ultimate, he evades counterattacks by hiding himself in a scouring gust of sand, and stuns foes by striking them from beneath.
npe_desc_loc: Burrows to stun and slow enemies

facets.description_loc: Sand Storm follows Sand King when he moves or Burrowstrikes.
facets.name: sand_king_dust_devil

abilities.name: sandking_burrowstrike
abilities.desc_loc:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit

Can be put on alt-cast to immediately cast in the desired direction, without walking towards the targeted location.
abilities.lore_loc: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

abilities.name: sandking_sand_storm
abilities.desc_loc: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
abilities.lore_loc: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
notes_loc: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
Sand King briefly becomes visible upon attacking or using spells while in Sand Storm. Sand King will become invisible again in %fade_delay% seconds.
abilities.scepter_loc: Every %damage_tick_rate%s, %scepter_explosions_per_pulse% Burrowstrike spines are created at random locations, each measuring %scepter_explosion_radius_pct%%% of the Sand Storm's current radius, that apply Burrowstrike damage and stun to enemies hit.
facets_loc: Sand Storm has increased radius and grants Sand King Invisibility while in it.
Sand Storm follows Sand King at a rate of %sand_storm_move_speed_pct%%% of his movement speed. Sand Storm moves to the location of Burrowstrike when cast.

abilities.name: sandking_scorpion_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Sand King strikes an area, performing an attack with bonus damage on all enemies in the area of effect. Enemies within an innermost radius of %inner_radius% take %inner_radius_bonus_damage_pct%%% extra damage. Applies Caustic Finale and a slow to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: sandking_caustic_finale
abilities.desc_loc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when they die.
abilities.lore_loc: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

abilities.name: sandking_epicenter
abilities.desc_loc: After a cast point of %abilitycastpoint% seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
abilities.lore_loc: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
notes_loc: The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases Epicenter Pulse damage, and every %shard_interval%s causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_sand_king_4
talents.desc_loc: Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by {s:value}% and miss {s:value}% of their attacks.
